attributes.action: Ban The MOBO Awards (Music of Black Origin)
attributes.additional_details: SIGN THIS PETITION TO BAN THE MOBO AWARDS
attributes.background: Ever heard of the MOBO awards? Did you know it mean Music Of Black Origin? How is this acceptable? I find it disgusting how there should be a separate award system for music based on the colour of an artists skin! Music should be appreciated as a whole no matter what colour skin you have!
